title: Build web app + deploy
description: Generate a responsive React dashboard, integrate tests, and prepare deployment instructions.
prompt: Design and implement a responsive SaaS analytics dashboard with login, data visualizations, and deploy to Vercel preview. Include unit and integration tests.

title: Debug failing repo
description: Inspect failing pytest suite, patch the bug, and return passing CI summary.
prompt: Clone https://github.com/example/broken-repo, analyze failing pytest output, implement fixes, add regression tests, and summarize the resolution.

title: Natural language to SQL
description: Translate executive asks to optimized SQL and visual insights.
prompt: Given the 'sales_warehouse' dataset, produce key revenue metrics by region, generate SQL optimized for Snowflake, run via DuckDB fallback, and produce an annotated chart.

title: Nonlinear physics simulation
description: Solve a chaotic pendulum system with comparative solvers and plots.
prompt: Model a double pendulum with varying initial conditions, compare SymPy and JAX integrators, plot energy drift, and recommend the best solver configuration.

title: GitHub PR automation
description: Read an issue, implement fix with tests, and prepare PR summary.
prompt: Review issue #123 from the configured repository, plan a fix, create a feature branch, update code and tests, run CI, and draft a PR with risk notes.
